column4: Hmm. Won't play embedded quicktime, but then that's expected.
Is there any way of getting Firefox to play embedded quicktime under Ubuntu?
?? you dont have to install windows to sue wine
did you initiate the setup with swat
I usually start my setup of samba by running swat then I just edit the samba.conf file for the more complex stuff
open konqueror type  fish://192.168.etc.etc  or  fish://joeblogs@192.168.etc.etc
no brainer ssh file management front end
I use a thing called smb4k to connect to windows shares from Linux
no more along the lines of Microsoft keeps changing things
not by default but if you run the easyubuntu script it will setup the stuff needed to play mp3's among other things
the mp3 media format is actually a licensed standard owned by Thomson
you have to pay for it
there is a Ubuntu thing for codecs were you can buy them
apple hasnt released anything for Linux
